query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_clientes,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN validationStatus = 'pending' THEN 1 END) as pending,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN validationStatus = 'rich' THEN 1 END) as rich,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pesquisaId = 1 THEN 1 END) as com_pesquisa_1,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NULL THEN 1 END) as sem_pesquisa
FROM clientes 
WHERE projectId = 1;

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_clientes,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN validationStatus = 'pending' THEN 1 END) as pending,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN validationStatus = 'rich' THEN 1 END) as rich,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pesquisaId = 1 THEN 1 END) as com_pesquisa_1,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pesquisaId IS NULL THEN 1 END) as sem_pesquisa
FROM clientes 
WHERE projectId = 1;
